data.message: I wouldn't mind paying for an ad-free Facebook like is offered on Kindle.  Facebook people - think about this option.  In the interim cut back on the ads everywhere on screen, in timeline, etc.  Too, too much.

replies.message: Hi, Bill. Ads help keep Facebook free and we strive to only show ads that are relevant and interesting to you. If you don't want to see a specific ad, you can click the x on the top right corner of the ad and choose hide. This will ensure that you no longer see this ad in your News Feed. -Rhea
